flavorZh: 所以你準備好冒險了嗎？

flavorEn: Ah, that’s the face of an adventurer!
"I heard that people were missing in town……"
You ARE part of the lore.

flavorZh: 事情可以有不同的發展......
如果我能回到過去，我可以拯救世界。
flavorEn: If I could travel back in time, I could save the world.

flavorZh: 「被你發現了啊。我以為我很小心呢。」
flavorEn: "So you’ve found me. I thought I was careful."
Drink some potions, read some books.

flavorZh: 睡覺，然後也許輪班守夜。
flavorEn: Sleep, and maybe take night shifts.

Note: Click one of our FB, IG, Threads Gmail link
Click the deity page that you believe in

flavorEn: So that’s you. Your character card.

flavorZh: 所有故事都有他的發展。
Note: Read a chapter by clicking next or previous chapter
Visit a chapter more than once
